features.featureTitle:
In `frontend/src/pages/FieldServiceGroupProfile.tsx`, update the existing badges that display the labels "Overseer" and "Assistant" so that:
- "Overseer" badges use a black background (#000000 or Tailwind equivalent) with white text.
- "Assistant" badges use a gray background (#6B7280 or #9CA3AF, or Tailwind equivalent) with white text.
Keep the badges the same size, padding, typography, border radius, and general styling as before; only change their background and text colors. Do not change "Elder" or "Ministerial Servant" badge colors.
